data.title: Why has Barisan Nasional (BN) and UMNO continued to lose members and component parties since their loss in 2018?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 3): Because up until that point, UMNO was unbeatable at the federal and the state level in a majority of states for 61 years. So the logic was clear, join BN if you want any realistic chance in governing and BN was associated with that brand. Since 2018 because of the 1MDB scandal, t...
